scripts.lint:html: bash -c 'shopt -s nullglob; files=(agrimate-website/**/*.html); if [ ${#files[@]} -gt 0 ]; then html-validate "${files[@]}"; else echo "No HTML files to validate."; fi'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:playwright
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test:playwright && npm run lhci:collect && npm run lhci:assert
